tp.pr3

Class Place

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr3.Place

  • public class Place
extends java.lang.Object
    It represents a place in the city. Places are connected by streets according to the 4 compass directions: North, East, South and West. Every place has a name and a textual description about itself. This description is displayed when the robot arrives at the place. A place can represent the spaceship where the robot is safe. When the robot arrives at this place, the robot shuts down and the application will finish.

    • Method Detail

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Place p)

      • addItem

        public boolean addItem(Item item)
        Tries to add an item to the place. The operation can fail (if the place already contains an item with the same name)
        Parameters:
        item - The item to be added
        Returns:
        true if and only if the item can be added to the place, i.e., the place does not contain an item with the same name

      • pickItem

        public Item pickItem(java.lang.String id)
        Tries to pick an item characterized by a given identifier from the place. If the action was completed the item must be removed from the place
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of the item
        Returns:
        The item of identifier id if it exists in the place. Otherwise the method returns null

      • findItem

        public Item findItem(java.lang.String id)
        Returns the item from the container according to the item name
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of the item
        Returns:
        Item with that name or null if the container does not store an item with that name

      • isSpaceship

        public boolean isSpaceship()
        Is it a spaceship?
        Returns:
        true if the place represents a spaceship

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides toString method. Returns the place name and its description
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • existItem

        public boolean existItem(java.lang.String id)
        Checks if an item is in this place
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of the item
        Returns:
        The item of identifier id if it exists in the place. Otherwise the method returns null

      • dropItem

        public boolean dropItem(Item it)
        Drop an item in this place. The operation can fail, returning false
        Parameters:
        it - The name of the item to be dropped.
        Returns:
        true if and only if the item is dropped in the place, i.e., an item with the same identifier does not exists in the place
